channel.title: Having trouble with making a jail
channel.description:
I went searching for tuts on how to make a jail, and make it so you type ::jail (personsname) and ::unjail(personsname) But it seems that I only found 2 tuts on this, both are horribly explained and IMPOSSIBLE to understand. If anyone can link me or tell me a tut for It I will be reallly super happy, thanks for your time.
Regards
John

item.title: Having trouble with making a jail
item.dc:creator: @noob_pwner noob pwner
item.description:
@noob_pwner wrote:

} if (command.startsWith("jail") && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(5); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 3015; c.teleportToY = 3194; c.teleblock = true; c.sendMessage("You Have been thrown to JAIL!"); c.sendMessage("I would say sorry if I were you"); c.teleblock = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; } else if (command.startsWith("unjail") && command.length() > 7 && playerRights >= 1) { String name = command.substring(7); client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)]; c.teleportToX = 2611; c.teleportToY = 3092; c.teleblock = false; c.sendMessage("Hope you have learned the Lesson!"); updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }
use those commands for ::jail and ::unjail…

Read full topic

Learn programming rather than being spoon-fed,
The Internet is a powerful thing.

item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

So, you’re telling me you cant change integers and call methods but your server is great, somehow that doesn’t sound good.

[quote=“mclovinscape, post:10, topic:236829”]You got to learn yes but ill give you a link…are you registered on google, its another rsps forum but this one is better

if not regester at google.com/forums

its on that website

i cant say google
nevermind i cant say the website sorry :P[/quote]
Rune~server?

item.title: Having trouble with making a jail
item.dc:creator: @mclovinscape mclovinscape
item.description:
@mclovinscape wrote:

[quote=“x blitz x, post:3, topic:236829”]I’m not going to tell you how, i’m going to give u a list of what to learn.

Java:

[ul][li]Integers - What they are and how to change them[/li]
[li]Methods - What they are and how to call them[/li][/ul]

Private servers:

[ul][li]Integers - How to save them and load them[/li]
[li]Methods - Global Objects [/li][/ul][/quote]
lol why wouldnt you?
